name: Falcomon_(2006_anime)
description: Falcomon (2006 anime) is a great horned owl ( Bubo virginianus ) with a small, toothless beak, red eye markings, dark grey body feathers and purple chest feathers with shuriken markings resembling a ninja 's vest. The tips of its brow feathers as well as its claws are purple while its tail feathers and the markings on the ends of its wings are red.
